explains: adj. 怀偏见的；有成见的；偏颇的
v. 损害（prejudice 的过去分词）；使抱偏见
wordGroup: be prejudiced against 对...有偏见

sentences.en: Few people will admit to being racially prejudiced.
sentences.cn: 很少有人会承认自己有种族偏见。

sentences.en: Some landlords and landladies are racially prejudiced.
Now we know why she was prejudiced against the redskins.
sentences.cn: 现在我们知道她为什么对红皮肤的印第安人有偏见了。
